definition: مدح madaḥa a (madḥ, مدحة midḥa) to praise, commend, laud, extol (ه s.o.); to eulogize, celebrate in poems (هه s.o.) II do. V to be commended, be praised, be lauded; to boast (ب of s.th.), glory (ب in), pride o.s. (ب on), be proud (ب of) VIII = I مدح madḥ commendation, laudation, praise; extolment, glorification; panegyrical litsrature; acclaim │ المدح في الله the glorification of God
